snippet.title: Swift: Firebase 3 - How to Load Messages (Ep 9)
snippet.description:
Today's lesson will cover how to load our messages into our main controller.  However, we'll first need to fix up our UI so that we can link the sent messages to the proper user.  In addition, I'll talk about the proper data structure to save our messages in Firebase.  We'll finally observe the messages in MessagesController to display all of our latest messages.  Quite a bit to fix but we're really starting to see how the app is coming together. Enjoy.

Previous Episode 8:
https://youtu.be/FDay6ocBlnE

All episodes for Firebase 3 series:
https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL0dzCUj1L5JEfHqwjBV0XFb9qx9cGXwkq

Completed Source Code
https://www.letsbuildthatapp.com/course/firebase-chat-messenger

Want to learn more about iOS Development? Here are a few additional playlist resources on my channel:
